casebody.data:
Michael Eric BALLARD, petitioner,
v.
PENNSYLVANIA. No. 13-9364. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 11, 2014.

Opinion

Letters of June 2, July 8, July 14, and July 16, 2014, received in this case referred to the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania for any investigation or action it finds appropriate.
